keyMoments.title: Competes in Roller Race Round
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates participate in the third round of the Davy Back Fight, fielding Luffy, Robin, Nami, and Usopp as racers with support from Zoro and Sanji. Despite Luffy's inability to skate, the crew works together using creative tactics and teamwork.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's adaptability and willingness to compete in unconventional challenges to recover their lost crewmate Chopper.

keyMoments.title: Foxy Devils Team Competes in Roller Race
keyMoments.description: The Foxy Pirates deploy their specialized Foxy Devils roller racing team, consisting of Chiqicheetah, Mashikaku, Jube, and Girarin, demonstrating Foxy's strategy of having specialized teams for different Davy Back Fight events.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the depth of the Foxy Pirates' organization and their preparation for various competition formats, having won 920 previous Davy Back Fights.
